attributes.action: The Aviation and Travel and Tourism needs your help fast before it collapses.
attributes.additional_details:
You need to act fast and step in and offer to help the struggling Airlines and travel and tourism business badly affected.  
I am requesting that you offer business loans and immediate finds to help our industry. 
There are so many people who are worried about their jobs and futures.   
This has been the worst catastrophe to happen in our lifetime.   
Please act fast and step in to offer your help and release emergency funding to help and support the UK businesses.  Before it’s far too late.
attributes.background:
You need to Step in and support our industry before it is too late.   
The Travel and Tourism Industry employs thousands of people and we now need your help and support.  
There is going to be thousands of redundancies If you don’t act fast and step
In to help.
Act quick before it is too late.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions calling for the same action:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/302139
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/303081

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus
